SELECT ModuleID AS "ModuleID" , ModuleName AS "ModuleName" , AuditMethod AS "AuditMethod" , AuditClass AS "AuditClass" , URL AS "URL" , BizSection AS "BizSection" , IsUse AS "IsUse" , IsAdmin AS "IsAdmin" , IsAudit AS "IsAudit" , Description AS "Description" , RegisterCode AS "RegisterCode" , TO_CHAR(RegistDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "RegistDate" , ModifierCode AS "ModifierCode" , TO_CHAR(ModifyDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "ModifyDate" , ( SELECT LISTAGG( (SELECT DisplayName FROM sys_object_menu WHERE MenuID = d.MenuID) , ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY b.moduleid) FROM sys_object_program_map b JOIN sys_object_program c on b.PRGMID = c.PRGMID JOIN sys_object_program_menu d on d.PRGMID = c.PRGMID WHERE a.moduleid = b.moduleid) AS "AuditMenuNm" FROM sys_object_module a
AND UPPER(URL) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchText})||'%'
AND UPPER(MODULEID) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchText})||'%'
AND UPPER(ModuleName) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchText})||'%'
AND UPPER(AuditMethod) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchText})||'%'
AND UPPER(AuditClass) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchText})||'%'
AND UPPER(bizSection) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchText})||'%'
AND UPPER(MODULEID) = UPPER(#{moduleId})
ORDER BY URL ASC
